description: Idris Tytania is the youngest of the four Dukes in line for succeeding as the head of the clan. Under orders from Ajman he assassinates the Secretary of the Emperor, to initiate Tytania`s supremacy. Idris will use any means to resolve a conflict and succeed as the head of the Tytania clan, even if it means putting the other dukes in trouble. Idris flagship name is called the Fire Phoenix.
name: Idris Tytania
